text: "Sweet Thing" is a 1992 song recorded by English singer-songwriter Mick Jagger who also wrote it. It was the first single from his album Wandering Spirit and was released in January 1993. It achieved success in many countries worldwide, becoming a top ten hit in Austria, France, Norway and Switzerland. It achieved a minor success in the United States, peaking at number 84 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Formats and track listings== These are the formats and track listings of major single releases of "Sweet Thing": * CD single -
